<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clever Gambit](/Feats.aspx?ID=1782) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 134 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Butterfly Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=91) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[mastermind racket](/Rackets.aspx?ID=5)

**Trigger**
Your Strike critically hits and deals damage to a creature you've identified with [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26).

</column>

---

Your battle tactics are aided by your assessment of your foes' capabilities, allowing you to instantly adjust your movements to maximum advantage. You Step or Stride; this movement doesn't trigger reactions from the triggering creature.
name: Clever Gambit
